policy.p_intro: Aakar Pratishthan is grateful for the support it receives from donors. To ensure transparency, please read our donation policy.
policy.p1: All donations will be used to further the objectives stated in our Trust Deed, including but not limited to educational programs, community health initiatives, and cultural events.
policy.p2: Aakar Pratishthan is a registered non-profit public trust. However, we do not currently have 80G certification. Therefore, donations made to the trust are not eligible for tax exemption.
policy.p3: An official receipt will be issued for every donation. For online donations, the receipt will be sent automatically to the email address you provide.
policy.p4: Donations are generally non-refundable. However, we can consider a refund in cases of clear transactional errors (e.g., a duplicate payment). A written request must be sent to aakarpratishthan@gmail.com within 10 days of the transaction.
policy.p5: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
policy.p6: We currently accept donations only in Indian Rupees (INR) from Indian citizens. We are not registered under the Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act (FCRA) and cannot accept contributions from foreign sources.
